main.name: Brian Spencer
main.description: I love to create experiences in Javascript
main.bio: Hi there! My name is Brian Spencer! I discovered my love for programming during the COVID-19 lock down and have committed myself to learning the Javascript tech stack. I specialize in using front end technologies for developing responsive web designs and user experiences. As a Front End Developer, I've worked on both website clones using the Javascript stack like ReactJS and NextJS, as well as vanilla Javascript projects to build & scale them to completion. Along my journey I realized my passion existed in creating digital experiences for others. With this passion, I have dedicated myself to develop real world usable code by reading documentation, getting coaching sessions through my mentor and by progressing through personal projects.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me! Let's create an experience for your users!

work.title: Staff Accountant
work.description: Managed the preparation, formatting, generation and distribution of month end financial reports/statements for a portfolio of 45 clients in the real estate industry following accrual basis of accounting. The month end closing process included multiple bank reconciliations, accounts receivable reconciliations, prepaid reconciliation, closing account payable/receivable period, credit card reconciliations, accruing expenses, deferring revenues, analyzing accruals, accruing open purchase orders, actual vs budget analysis and month over month analysis.

testimonials.text: Brian is absolutely excellent, his drive to learn full stack Javascript is admirable and his ability to put in the time debugging made it clear to me that this was the correct career for him... I would definitely recommend
Having Brian on the team has been a rewarding experience, his ability to improve and communicate processes to new hires/exiting employees has increased productivity in the accounting department.
